title: Cannot connect to game server
body: After champion select i go into loading screen but it just turns black and says "Could not connect to the game server, please check your network connection and try again." However, the problem with this is, my network connection is fine. I have restarted my computer, and reinstalled the game. It is still happening.

replies.body: This black screen usually indicates a network problem that can't reach our game servers, and the error further affirms that.  Your best bet would be to reach our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Have the same problem after todays update, yesterday everything was fine.

SOLVED in my case by ports forwarding, official video guide https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fkxhsxaqkPI
